Description: MailUp is your complete email and SMS delivery solution.
Name: MailUp

Methods.Name: Create List
Methods.Description: Create a new list.

Methods.Name: Get Lists
Methods.Description: Return the lists that are visible for the current user.

Methods.Name: Delete List
Methods.Description: Delete an existing list.

Methods.Name: Update List
Methods.Description: Update an existing list. To update a list you have to provide an object that contains all the mandatory fields, even if you don't change them, and the optional fields that you want to modify.

Methods.Name: Get Time Zone Codes
Methods.Description: Return the list of Time Zone codes to create or update a list

Methods.Name: Get Country Codes
Methods.Description: Return the list of available country codes to create or update a list.

Methods.Name: Delete Group
Methods.Description: Delete a group in the specified list.

Methods.Name: Create Group
Methods.Description: Create a group into the specified list.

Methods.Name: Update Group
Methods.Description: Update a group in the specified list.

Methods.Name: Get Groups
Methods.Description: Read groups of a specified list.

Methods.Name: Add Recipient to Group
Methods.Description: Adds a single recipient to an existing group.

Methods.Name: Get Subscriber
Methods.Description: Checks if a subscriber exists, and if they do it returns information about them.

Methods.Name: Get Subscribers
Methods.Description: Returns all subscribers in a list

Methods.Name: Add Recipient to List
Methods.Description: Adds a single recipient to an existing list.

Methods.Name: Get Message Bounces
Methods.Description: Get bounces for the specified message.

Methods.Name: Get Message Recipients
Methods.Description: Get recipients that received the specified message.

Methods.Name: Get Message Clicks
Methods.Description: Get clicks for the specified message.

Methods.Name: Get Message Unsubscribes
Methods.Description: Get unsubscribes for the specified message.

Methods.Name: Get Message Opens
Methods.Description: Get opens for the specified message.

Methods.Name: Send Email to Recipient
Methods.Description: Send message to a single recipient.

Methods.Name: List Email Messages
Methods.Description: Retrieve email messages of a specified list.

Methods.Name: Send Email to List
Methods.Description: Send a message to all list subscribers.

Methods.Name: Send Email to Group
Methods.Description: Send a message to all subscribers of a group.
